alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 18 at 4:13PM EDT until March 18 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 52 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT /6 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA GENEVA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN THE BIG BEND OF FLORIDA GADSDEN LIBERTY IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA DECATUR SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, AUSMAC, BAINBRIDGE, BARKER STORE, BENNETT, BLOUNTSTOWN, BONIFAY, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CENTER RIDGE, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKSVILLE, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COTTONWOOD, CRYSTAL LAKE, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DECATUR CO A/P, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DURHAM, ECONFINA, EUCHEEANNA, FADETTE, FAIRCHILD, FIVE POINTS, FRINK, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GRACEVILLE, HACODA, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARTFORD, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, LYNN, LYNN HAVEN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, NEW HOPE, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, ORANGE HILL, PANAMA CITY, POPLAR HEAD, PORT ST. JOE, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, AND WHITE CITY.
